review: Honestly, it's not too reliable. It's good for the price but you get what you pay for.
author: NickA

review: This was recommended by a friend. I like it and it will cast any device that it is attached to. I did not realize it needed to be Wi-Fi connected. I guess that is my fault for not reading completely. That problem was solved with a Wi-Fi extender. Now I am happy.
author: Amazon Customer "bigkuka"

review: I use the Chromecast almost every day, to the point where I sometimes consider getting rid of cable altogether. With your phone as a remote, it is extremely simple to set up and use.
author: Steven Franco

review: WORKING JUST WITH GOOGLE NOT GOOD
